name: Wordfish
overview: Learn new words while you play with friends! • The Fun Way to Learn: fun mini-games teach you 16,000 words • Train at Your Own Pace: challenge yourself with games at different difficulty levels • Play with Friends: compare your knowledge in fun multiplayer games
